originalText.text: Dr smith was recommended for my variety of swallowing issues.  My first visit was great and I left there quite confident in his ability to help me out.  I had one test (a manometry) about 3 months ago.   After many many calls to his assistant letting her know the test had been completed, I have still not heard back from Dr Smith.  It was the most frustrating period and I have never dealt with such an irresponsible medical doctor. Happy that I gave up on waiting for his return call and sought out a new Dr that is fantastic.  If the option were available,  I would give no stars!

originalText.text: Dr. Michael Smith is not only one of the most outstanding experts in his field , but he has a unique ability to diagnosis, explain and treat the medical issue.

originalText.text: An objective review of Dr Michael Smith a specialist in Manometric Study interpretation for esophageal swallowing issues, is best garnered by reviewing the incomprehensible behaviors of his staff assistants! If you are hoping or expecting seamless communication frequently normative between physician & patient with assistants helping to schedule important testing information you may experience a variety of emotions when your calls are not returned leaving you to feel adrift & uncertain that you’ve made the right selection of care by Dr Smith!I hope my short review helps in some small way!
